Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $150. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at the same value of $150, ensuring you receive the best deal possible. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
